thread.title: Only one month to go on Scenic’s Earlybird offers for South America
thread.title_full: Only one month to go on Scenic’s Earlybird offers for South America

author: Chisa Boonmee
title: Only one month to go on Scenic’s Earlybird offers for South America
text:
Email 
There is only one month remaining for Scenic guests to take advantage of the fantastic Earlybird offers to South America which end on 30 September 2015. 
Guests can enjoy a partner fly free offer in economy class on South America tours of more than 16 days plus there are airfare credits of up to $1,500 per couple on all other tours of more than 12 days. Offers are also available for the solo traveller, and there are business class upgrades from just $4,195 per person return. 
In addition, Scenic has opened a new 2016 departure for its 20 Day Icons of South America tour – 12 September 2016. Visit Peru’s World Heritage site of Machu Picchu, the Sacred Valley for three nights, Cuzco – the historical capital of the Inca Empire and Lake Titicaca; the spectacular Iguazú Falls and the cities of Buenos Aires and Rio de Janeiro. Prices from $12,795 per person twin share. 
Australia’s leading operator of luxury touring Scenic, includes itineraries that visit all national treasures of South America, from the World Heritage-listed site of Machu Picchu and Peru’s historical capital of Cuzco, to the natural wonders of Iguazu Falls and Lake Titicaca, and the vibrant cities of Buenos Aires and Rio de Janeiro. 
For more information call Scenic on 138 128 or visit scenic.com.au. Share this:
